messages.title: Jo Crotty fights for our local hospital
messages.content: Warrington's hospital services could be under threat thanks to Labour's mismanagement and cuts. The hospital has been hit with a £13 million NHS black hole this year. Jo Crotty and the Liberal Democrats are committed to preserving NHS services in Warrington.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes privatisation of the NHS and Labour's mismanagement, promises to fight against hospital service cuts and funding shortfalls.
Mentions opposition to the Conservatives' proposed VAT increase.
Against the freeze of wages over £18,000 that the Conservatives' leader wants.

issues.health: Criticizes Labour for hospital service cuts and a funding shortfall leading to a NHS black hole. Also criticizes Conservative's approach to the NHS.

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaigns against GP surgeries closing and Labour's management decisions.

quotes.text: The Liberal Democrats have guaranteed to safeguard frontline services such as the NHS by cutting waste from the NHS budget.

images.caption: Jo Crotty and an unnamed individual standing in front of Warrington Hospital.
